index.p1: Hi, my name is Christopher and I'm a Fullstack Developer. This is my self-made portfolio website.
index.p2: Here you can find my resume, some of my side projects worth mentioning and also a few reviews of books, that I found particularly interesting.
index.p3: Feel free to have a look around.
